title: Realtime Gait Phase Prediction And Early Detection Of Gait Abnormality
subtitle: 3rd Year Project IIIT Kalyani
description: Leveraged 91% accuracy in real time classification on predicted next gait step with r2 score over 0.91 and 0.57 using Convolutional Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) based Attention model on walking data recorded through a portable module engineered with MPU 6050 sensor, Bluetooth module and Arduino in a lab setting. Realtime prediction was done in order of microseconds. The ANN model for classification was pretrained on Gait Rec dataset and transfer learning was used for recorded data.
